clinical_study.brief_title: Accuracy of a Blood Pressure Measuring Mobile Device in Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: M- HEALTHCARE Confirmatory Clinical Trials Used for Measurement of the ABP for the Accuracy and Safety Assessment of the Module Measuring Blood Pressure

brief_summary.textblock: The accuracy and safety of blood pressure module of new mobile device (M- HEALTHCARE device) is evaluated according to Korean FDA guidelines in 100 healthy volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: mean difference of systolic blood pressure
primary_outcome.description: mean difference of blood pressure between new and control device

primary_outcome.measure: mean difference of diastolic blood pressure
primary_outcome.description: mean difference of diastolic blood pressure between new and control device

primary_outcome.measure: standard deviation of the difference of systolic blood pressure
primary_outcome.description: standard deviation of the difference of systolic blood pressure between new and control device

primary_outcome.measure: standard deviation of the difference of diastolic blood pressure
primary_outcome.description: standard deviation of the difference of diastolic blood pressure between new and control device

arm_group.description: Blood pressure check using mobile device and control device

intervention.description: Check blood pressure using new device and conventional device alternatively. Compare blood pressure measured with new device and conventional device.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Participants whose systolic blood pressure <=110 should be at least 10% of whole cohort
2. Participants whose systolic blood pressure >=160 should be at least 10% of whole cohort
3. Participants whose diastolic blood pressure >=100 should be at least 10% of whole cohort
4. Participants whose diastolic blood pressure <=70 should be at least 10% of whole cohort
5. Participants whose arm circumference are between 20cm and 30cm should be 25 - 50% of whole cohort
6. Participants whose arm circumference are between 30cm and 40cm should be 50 - 75% of whole cohort
Exclusion Criteria:
1. heart disease with abnormal rhythm
2. peripheral vascular anomaly or disease
3. inadequate to be applied blood pressure cuff (e.g. trauma on arm)
4. pregnant or lactating women
